column5: Couldn't find a school of Perch........caught a dozen stragglers.....all nice size 12 1/2"........
Beats working tho!! Where were you fishing out of. I have been trying to time the perch when they come into the shallows along Maitland the last few years. Are they still out deep?  Darren
Those are some good size perch!
just down a bit from the hsbc center where the sabers play 30 to 42 feet
Looks like you may have been fishing off the South Gap around the departure bouy.  Nice sized jack perch.  Tom
You been playing with Photoshop? Those are the best colours I've seen on a perch in a long time!
I don't know why you aren't out smallie hunting  Nice fish none the less!
Thanks for the video clip....good background music too!
Hey Jay.........I don't know how to photoshop............I'm lucky I can post pictures!
Try first weeks of June for Maitland
Can't beat those Erie Perch  . Doing the Orillia Perch Fest for 3 weeks, Simcoe Perch are not that good. I throw them all back, I get my eaters from Erie  . Thanks for posting, looks like Burwell.
Nice perch, ya gotta love Erie for hawgs!
thanks guys fish farmer i was just past the peace bridge to the left
